endpoint.title: Object/Endpoint
endpoint.description: Sage Intacct object path to extract (e.g., accounts-receivable/customer, general-ledger/account)

columns.title: Fields
columns.description: Specific fields to extract. Leave empty to extract all fields.

initial_since.title: Initial Incremental Value
initial_since.description: ISO datetime for first incremental run (e.g., 2024-01-01T00:00:00Z). Only used on first run when no state exists.

table_name.title: Table Name
table_name.description: Output table name (defaults to endpoint name if not specified)

load_type.title: Load Type
load_type.description: Choose between full load (all data each run) or incremental load (only new/updated data)

incremental_field.title: Incremental Field
incremental_field.description: Field for incremental filtering (defaults to WHENMODIFIED). Only used when Load Type is incremental_load.

primary_key.title: Primary Key
primary_key.description: Primary key columns for the output table. Specify the field names that uniquely identify each record.
